summary: In 1919, a British expedition in the Antarctica region is searching for a lost American explorer and finds a hidden prehistoric world instead.
cast: Patrick Wayne|Doug McClure|Sarah Douglas|Dana Gillespie|Thorley Walters|Shane Rimmer|Tony Britton|John Hallam|David Prowse|Milton Reid|Kiran Shah|Richard LeParmentier|Jimmy Ray|Tony McHale
title: Viaje al mundo perdido
